def structure_correlation

Detailed Description

methods for local bond ordering of a group of particles in simulation.

Function Documentation

def MD.analysis.bond_order.structure_correlation (   M,
  L,
  rcut = 17.5,
  l = 6,
  c_cut = 0.15,
  crystal = 6 
)

Calculates the local bond ordering of a group of particles for a specfic frame.

Returns:
num number of solid particles in group of particles
Parameters:
M a group of atoms in matrix form [atoms][x,y,z]
L box-periodicty
r_cut cutoff for neighbor search
l bond order,6 for bcc, 4 for simple cubic
c_cut crystal value cutoff for identifying solid particle
crystal number of surrounding crystal particles to call a particle a crystal
